dialogue.utterance: I just participated in a digital gaming competition, and the level of competition was intense, really pushing me to improve.

dialogue.utterance: I totally agree! But, have you noticed how the prizes are often underwhelming compared to the effort we put in?

dialogue.utterance: Absolutely! It really enhances the gaming experience and encourages even beginners to keep trying.
